issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

```adblock
@@||cloudfront.net/assets/production/app/application_community-*.css$domain=grabcad.com
```
to user rules.

issue.title: Annoyances filter breaks `https://www.androidacy.com/downloads/`
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

Firefox

Desktop

comment.body:
Please add this rule:
```adblock
m.biidh.com,w.acortaz.eu#%#(function(){try{ var a=location.href.split("/#");if(a[1]){a=a[1];for(var b=0;10>b;b++){a=atob(a);try{new URL(decodeURIComponent(a));var c=!0}catch(d){c=!1}if(c)try{location.assign(decodeURIComponent(a));break}catch(d){}}}}catch(d){}})();
```
to user rules, it should automatically redirects to destination page.

comment.body:
If I'm not wrong, in this case it's one of the easiest way to copy/share a link to a specific reply, so I'm not sure if it should be blocked.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/199461215-3c4c8a98-5f74-4ec4-a4db-17229e727a8b.png)

</details>

Please add this rule:
```adblock
forum.xda-developers.com##.message-attribution-opposite > li > a[data-xf-init="share-tooltip"]
```
to user rules.

labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.bing.com/search?q=fritz+dect+302&go=Suche&qs=ds&form=QBRE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dfritz%2Bdect%2B302%26go%3DSuche%26qs%3Dds%26form%3DQBRE) ### Comment Username: @tox1c90 > I think I understand now what the problem is that in some cases Bing ads are slipping through. Just noticed by chance that ALL of my search results are served as IMAGES/blobs instead of text. Only the headlines and URLs can be selected and copied as text, the actual preview of each result including the "ad" marker is contained in an image object, if you try to select the text with your mouse/cursor one actually drags the whole thing around. > This is not only the case for ads, but for all search results when Adguard is enabled. > > In inPrivate mode of the browser, this does not happen, and all search results are served as proper selectable text. And then, Adguard is able to block all ads. > > So the ads are obviously not missed by the filter, but it's Bing running some kind of Adblock detection, which switches the way search results are delivered from text mode to small inline images/snippets/blobs. > > Anything one can do to get around this? Better way of hiding Adguard? ### Screenshots

Наклацала непонятно что, вроде вернула все обратно, но теперь вылезла проблема - законные две рекламы вернулись к моим просмотрам сериалов и фильмов. > @Abdulmajid-Aljarrah 
> 
> 
> 
> Please follow these steps:
> 
> 
> 
> 1. Go to settings > Safari > extensions, disable all AdGuard extensions wait a little and enable them again.
> 
> 2. Go to the AdGuard app and update the filters, wait 2-3 minutes without closing the app.
> 
> 3. Reboot your device
> 
> 4. Go to this site and check for ads, there shouldn't be any.

comment.body:
`Online Malicious URL Blocklist` is a third-party filter list and it's not maintained by us, so please add this rule:
```adblock
||res.cl$badfilter
```
to user rules.

As far as I can see, someone already reported issue regarding this rule to them - https://gitlab.com/malware-filter/urlhaus-filter/-/issues/73

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

pull_request.title: fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/133556
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0.75

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://app.animevsub.ml

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, KAD - Anti-Scam, Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Block WebRTC, Block Location API, Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. This is an open source application download site to watch Anime online
Source code: https://github.com/anime-vsub/app
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![Screenshot_2022-11-02-21-51-20](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45375496/199525114-c05b25fe-f288-453e-9cf3-58cbebbb0e0d.png)

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: To the OP in particular: The site should work normally after clicking the "Proceed anyway" button, but I'll make sure to analyse the site for a potential permanent whitelisting.

comment.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://rezka.ag](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Frezka.ag) ### Comment > Смотрела было все ок, только сильно подвисало постоянно, на сайте прямым текстом написано, что если вы используете блокировщики рекламы, сайт будет виснуть. Мне это надоело, я решила полазить в настройках вашего приложения, вдруг найду что-то полезное. Наклацала непонятно что, вроде вернула все обратно, но теперь вылезла проблема - законные две рекламы вернулись к моим просмотрам сериалов и фильмов. При этом на самом сайте много всплывающих окон и баннеров, их по прежнему не видно. Что я наклацала не знаю, в самом сафари расширение включено, с настроек все включено, если в приложение зайти то там стоит защита сафари включена. А по факту лажа. Хелп, сама я не могу разобраться. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/YrLbTIG.jpg)

comment.body:
@AdamWr well, you can copy a link to a post by right-clicking on the post number and selecting `Copy Link Address`. But if this method seems more complicated to you, then you can leave the method as you indicated.

But then I would like you to block the leftovers from the social media buttons in the pop-up menu, such as the text `Share this post` and the empty space below it.
